title: Column: L.A., it's time to choose a mayor. Is it Bass' moment, or Caruso's?
dc:creator: Steve Lopez
description: Many L.A. residents seem to be pretty fixed on who they like and trust in the race for mayor between Karen Bass and Rick Caruso.
content:encoded: Many L.A. residents seem to be pretty fixed on who they like and trust in the race for mayor between Karen Bass and Rick Caruso.

media:content.media:description: Left; Mayoral candidate Karen Bass casts her ballot at Baldwin Hills Crenshaw Mall on June 7. Right; Mayoral candidate Rick Caruso speaks to his supporters on election night at the Grove on June 7.
media:content.media:credit: Christina House, Wally Skalij/Los Angeles Times
